main event: A single unidentified flying object was observed on 26 July 1948 in Chamblee, Ga, emitting blue-white light and long contrails, moving at high speed in a southeast direction before turning south.
interesting points: The UFO was observed emitting blue-white light with long contrails, indicating a high-speed movement.
The object was observed making a sharp turn from southeast to south.
The report is from Naval Air Station Outsnopur, suggesting credible witnesses.
The document is a Temporary AAF Form 339, indicating an official government record.
The report lacks photographs or sketches of the observed object.
sighted object: a single unidentified flying object emitting blue-white light and long contrails
